verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: On Thursday] [ARG0: press officials for the White House] [V: announced] [ARG1: that Donald Trump would be visiting the UK this summer for a " working visit " with Britain 's Prime Minister Theresa May.] London 's Mayor Sadiq Khan took to Twitter following the announcement to blast Trump .
